DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to describe the impact of treatment with adalimumab on work related productivity and economic burden in patients with Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA) treated in Canada.
DOC.brief_title: Progress at Work - The Impact of Adalimumab on Work Related Productivity in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: 1. Subjects with moderate to severe RA for whom the physician has decided to initiate treatment with adalimumab 2.
